participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: An energetic and health-conscious individual who enjoys fitness activities.
participant_1.background: eating is something i do when i'm bored. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. two dogs live with me.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: A nostalgic and passionate athlete who cherishes memories of past achievements.
participant_2.background: i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter.
